item.description:
Are you struggling trying to afford raw foods? We all have been there.

Using a holistic approach, Brandi Rollins, author of Raw Foods on a Budget (Release date: July 2011) and Confessions of an East Coast Raw Vegan, will show you HOW and WHERE to buy inexpensive, high-quality produce, how to PREPARE, STORE, and EAT raw foods in a way that stretches your dollar, how to create and maintain a BUDGET, and even how to embrace the ABUNDANCE and JOY a budget can bring to your life!

Learning how to live raw foods on a budget is more than just about finding cheap produce. It’s a way of LIFE!

In this workshop, you will:

 
  • LEARN powerful strategies to reduce your food bills by 15 to 50%!
  • DISCOVER why living on budget is more than just finding about cheap produce!
  • DO exercises that will help you determine the life you want!
  • LEARN first-hand how to use inexpensive ingredients to replace pricey nuts and sweeteners.
  • LEARN how to prepare easy, kid-friendly, inexpensive recipes including donut holes, the BEST Pate Ever, and my new Spring Pizza!
  • RECEIVE a copy of the Raw Foods on a Budget eBook! (a $10 value)

The yummy recipes that will be prepared during the workshop!!!


Workshop will be held at:
Organic Garden Cafe
294 Cabot St.
Beverly, MA 01915

www.organicgardencafe.com

 

Saturday, June 4, 2011
11am-3:00pm

Total Cost: $60.00  

CLICK HERE TO REGISTER!

Only 30 Seats Available!!!!!!
If you are an All Star, please visit the All Star Storefront to register at the discounted price of $35.00. Also, send me an email to let me know how many seats up front you need me to reserve. Thanks!

http://www.rawfoodsonabudget.com/events/organicgardencafe

 

Register online or call: (814) 933-0106 to Register!

 

http://www.rawfoodsonabudget.com/events/organicgardencafe
item.name: 4-HOUR Raw Foods on a Budget Workshop! (Beverly,MA)
